seg.quote: She left a note saying she would see us again.

sense.def:
A note
je tudi nekaj, kar zapišemo, da nečesa ne bi pozabili.

seg.quote: I'll make a note of that.
I took notes at the lecture.

sense.def:
V knjigi ali članku je
a note
kratko dodatno pojasnilo.

seg.quote: Yugoslavia is a different matter (see note on the Yugoslav situation, below).

sense.def:
V glasbi je
a note
zvok na določeni višini ali znamenje za ta zvok.

seg.quote: The first notes of the concerto sounded softly in the room.
Not one of them could read a note of music.

sense.def:
A note
je tudi
a banknote
.

Note
je tudi zven glasu, ki pokaže človekovo razpoloženje.

seg.quote: There was a note of triumph in her voice.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
notes something
, se nečesa zave.

seg.quote: He noted the minute change in her expression.
Note that the report does not carry any form of official recommendation.
His audience, I noted with regret, were looking bored.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
takes note of something
, je pozoren na tisto, ker misli, da je pomembno.

seg.quote: I had to start taking some note of political developments.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes a mental note of something
, si poskuša tisto zapomniti, ker bo pomembno ali koristno pozneje.

seg.quote: He made a mental note to tell Lamin later who these men were.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
compares notes with someone
, se pogovori s kom, da ugotovi, ali sta enakega mnenja, vesta isto ali sta doživela isto.

seg.quote: There are a few things we might compare notes on.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
notes something down
, tisto nekam napiše, da ima podatek shranjen za pozneje.

seg.quote: I'll give you time to note down where to send them.
